Gallery.Title: Stardew UI Gallery
Gallery.Welcome: Welcome to StardewUI's example gallery! To get started, click on any of the examples below to see it in action.
Gallery.Example.ItemGrid.Title: Item Grid
Gallery.Example.ItemGrid.Description: 'Intro to Stardew UI': A simple grid of items, showing their names and tooltips, like you might see in an inventory menu.
Gallery.Example.Bestiary.Title: Bestiary
Gallery.Example.Bestiary.Description: A tiny interactive monster guide. Shows animations, combat stats and loot tables in a tabbed view.
Gallery.Example.CropCalendar.Title: Crop Calendar
Gallery.Example.CropCalendar.Description: Idea for an interactive crop planner: view seeds, blooms, produce and harvest timing for any growable item.
Gallery.Example.Form.Title: Settings Form
Gallery.Example.Form.Description: Generic Mod Config Menu is great, but what if you're looking to build something a little less generic?
Gallery.Example.Tempering.Title: Tempering
Gallery.Example.Tempering.Description: UI for an imaginary mod that upgrades tools with mineral alloys. Also a demo for transitions and animations.
